title: Nature of Science and Creative Problem-Solving: Graduate-Level Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based mobile learning platforms with a formative assessment-centered iterative feedback structure.

learning_goals: Students can explain the role of scientific creativity from the Nature of Science (NOS) perspective
Students can design and execute creative problem-solving strategies in indeterminate problem situations
Students can reflect on the development of scientific thinking through peer assessment

resources: NOS (Nature of Science) Advanced Organizer Worksheet
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
